function EP01_09()

    -- .転-1「伊草エリカ・誕生」
    SaveData.Title = "伊草エリカ・誕生"

    -- //BG：多目的トイレ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG007aa")

    -- //BU：伊草アキラ（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0060.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ten minutes until the entrance ceremony starts. Somehow, we made it in time." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira put the makeup tools back into the box and let out a breath, looking accomplished. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0168.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "...So, how do I look? Do I seem like a girl?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0061.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "You should check for yourself in the mirror over there." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira pointed toward the mirror by the washbasin. Despite the unfamiliar sensation of the skirt clinging to my legs making my heart race, I approached the mirror and peered in. ]])

    MSG([[ Then, there in the mirror— ]])


    STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：女装したミナト
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV003aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

    PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    -- 27	ボク⇒“姫”Ａ・Ｂ・Ｃ	初めて女装を経験した
    UNLOCK_TROPHY(27)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0169.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ma-Marika-neesan...?" ]])

    MSG([[ The face reflected was strikingly similar to Marika's. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0062.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What are you saying, Mina-chin? That's your own face." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0170.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh?" ]])

    MSG([[ As I brought my face closer to the mirror. ]])

    MSG([[ On closer inspection, there were indeed differences. At first glance, one might mistake it, but the hairstyle and facial features had subtle distinctions. ]])

    MSG([[ Those differences became clearer when lifting the side hair. The bone structure itself was different from Nee-san's. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-Is this really me...?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0063.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Heh. Surprised, aren’t you? The shortcut to looking cute is imitation. And among the girls we know, Mariccho is the most beautiful." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0064.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "So, I styled your makeup and hair aiming to match Mariccho." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-Wearing a wig and putting on makeup, but... that’s amazing skill." ]])

    MSG([[ It’s embarrassing enough to even be mistaken for Nee-san for a moment, but Akira’s crossdressing skill is so excellent it’s understandable. ]])

    MSG([[ The wig reached down to my waist, loosely waved overall, looking so natural it couldn’t pass for artificial. ]])

    MSG([[ With translucent white skin, voluminous eyelashes, and eyes that carry a hint of melancholy, it overlapped with the image of Nee-san in my memory. ]])

    MSG([[ Moreover, from a glance, you can’t tell I’m wearing makeup—it’s that natural. ]])

    -- //BG：多目的トイレ
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG007aa")
    -- //BU：アキラ（ニヤリ）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0065.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "There are various techniques to hide the jawline with side hair, reduce facial volume through makeup, and appear more girlish." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0066.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Well, above all, it’s because Mina-chin resembles Mariccho. It fit better than expected—it’s a mighty surprise, Enter key! Ta-da!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0067.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Anyway. No time for highbrow jokes." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0068.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Now then, Mina-chin—no, Erika Ikusa! Make sure you get through the entrance ceremony in that form!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ugh." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ R-Right... I didn’t have time to get emotional. I have to go out in public in this form now. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I'm so nervous..." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0069.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "It’s fine. The crossdressing is so high quality that even Mina-chin, who’s spent the most time with Mariccho, could mistake it." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0070.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Just don’t let yourself get weird feelings surrounded by girls and you’ll be fine." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "I-I’m not going to get weird feelings!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Just standing here is making me feel like I’m going to faint. There’s no way I’m that relaxed. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0071.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Just kidding. Mina-chin’s not just herbivorous, you’re at the enlightened level, totally desireless. I believe you’d never do anything terrible to girls." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Ah, thanks. Honestly, I’m mixed up inside, but I’ll take it that you believe me." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0072.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Now, seriously, Mina-chin, there are three points you need to protect outside." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0073.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "First, your first-person pronoun. Don’t use ‘boku’. You must stick to ‘watashi.’" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01fb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0074.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "‘Boku-girls’ are only acceptable in two-dimensional worlds. Women who call themselves that are unconditionally disliked by other women. Even if no one suspects you’re male, it doesn’t lead to a good result." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira spoke with a surprisingly passionate voice. I wonder if something happened with a ‘boku-girl’... better not ask. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0075.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Second, your voice. Try introducing yourself in the voice you used for the phone call when crossdressing." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Uh, um... My name is Erika Ikusa. I dislike earthquakes. My favorite G-prefecture specialty is G Tanmen. ...How’s that?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0076.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Hmm, that’s 45 points. It still sounds a bit boyish. Try raising your pitch by a half tone." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0077.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Repeat after me: G Tanmen." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0178.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "G-G Tanmen." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0078.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "This time it’s a bit too high and the voice cracks a little. Lower it a bit." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0079.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "G Tanmen." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0179.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "G Tanmen!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0080.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Good. That’s great. Mina-chin’s voice when answering the phone is polite and gentle—I always thought it sounded very girlish." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0081.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The key is always using polite language. That way, you can speak with a similar mindset as when answering the phone, right?" ]])

    MSG([[ Honestly, I hadn’t realized I changed my voice that much myself... ]])

    MSG([[ But if Akira says so, I’ll believe her. The image of answering the phone is very easy to understand and helpful. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "And lastly, don’t approach the students called ‘hime’ (princesses)." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0180.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "H-Hime...?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I’ve heard the term somewhere before. Right. It was from Riko-san on exam day—referring to the four students said to be the most beautiful at Yuriai Private Academy. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0181.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "W-Wait a second. The people who must know about Nee-san are probably those ‘hime.’ Why can’t I go near them?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Akira bit her lip with difficulty, shaking her head. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "If you get close to the ‘hime,’ there will definitely be trouble. I’ll explain in detail later, so hurry and go." ]])

    MSG([[ Akira briskly pushed me toward the door. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Anyway... don't go near the ‘hime.’ Use ‘watashi’ as your first-person pronoun when speaking like on the phone. Those three points are what you absolutely must follow." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0182.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "O-Okay, okay, I’ll do my best somehow..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Saying that, I put my hand on the multipurpose restroom door. At that moment, a shiver ran down my spine, and my legs tingled. ]])

    MSG([[ ...It’s okay. It’s not a physical problem. My body’s just scared. It’s okay. It’s okay. ]])

    MSG([[ I told myself that, but my body wouldn’t obey easily. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "Ah, I forgot to mention something. I put something important of yours into the outfit, Mina-chin." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "The brooch on your chest can be opened and closed, so try opening it." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0183.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Eh, the brooch? This one on my chest?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I took the blue brooch on my chest in my hand and opened it as told. Then— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //CI：ペンダントの写真（ミナト・マリカ・アキラ） 002
LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI002b")
--LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005",1000,false)

    MSG([[ There was a familiar photo inside. ]])

--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006",0,false)
--LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,600,0,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
--LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,1000,Ease.OutQuad)
--WAIT(1000)
--LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,-200,500,Ease.InSine)
WAIT(500)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "What a surprise ~ There’s the photo that’s Mina-chin’s emotional support ~" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "I made it so you can fit your usual necklace into it. Thanks to my expert craftsmanship, you’re a hundred times braver, Mina-chin-man, right?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0184.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 "Th-Thank you, Akira! That’s really a classy touch!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0185.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (For Akira who’s thinking about me this much... I have to do my best!) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ I returned the brooch to its place and closed my eyes. Repeating over and over inside my head. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0186.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 (From the moment I open this door, I am no longer Minato Ikusa.) ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_0004.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I... no, I am Erika Ikusa." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Summoning courage—I opened the door. Warm morning sunlight streamed through the gap, and a cool breeze blew inside. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 "...Take care, Erika. I believe in you." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_0005.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yeah, I’ll do my best. See you later." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    MSG([[ Then, trembling at the chill of the wind on my skirt, I stepped out of the multipurpose restroom— ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 2000)
    --WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //OPムービー
    OpMovie()

    ScenarioManager.Next("EP01_10")

end
